targets.query: SELECT "run_number" FROM "dunedaq.rcif.opmon.RunInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "run_number" >0 AND $timeFilter
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_total_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.ModuleLevelTriggerInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tds_failed_bitword_tc_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TCProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tds_cleared_tc_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TCProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("received")),1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TriggerDecisionInfo" WHERE "session"::tag = '${session}' AND type=~ /k${type}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)  fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("completed")),1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TriggerInfo" WHERE "session"::tag = '${session}' AND type=~ /k${type}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)  fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("sent")),1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TriggerDecisionInfo" WHERE "session"::tag = '${session}' AND type=~ /k${type}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)  fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("ta_received_count"), 1s) AS data FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TAProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "element"=~/${ta_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("latency_in") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TriggerLatency" WHERE session::tag = '${session}' AND "element"::tag = '${MLT}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("latency_out") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TriggerLatency" WHERE session::tag = '${session}' AND "element"::tag = '${MLT}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("latency_out")-mean("latency_in") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TriggerLatency" WHERE session::tag = '${session}' AND "element"::tag = '${MLT}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("latency_in") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TriggerLatency" WHERE session::tag = '${session}' AND "subelement"::tag = 'TCProcessor' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY element, time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("latency_out") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TriggerLatency" WHERE session::tag = '${session}' AND "subelement"::tag = 'TCProcessor' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY element, time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("latency_out")-mean("latency_in") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TriggerLatency" WHERE session::tag = '${session}' AND "subelement"::tag = 'TCProcessor' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY element, time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("latency_in") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TriggerLatency" WHERE session::tag = '${session}' AND "element"::tag =~ /${ta_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY element, time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("latency_out") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TriggerLatency" WHERE session::tag = '${session}'  AND "element"::tag =~ /${ta_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY element, time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("latency_window_start") - mean("latency_window_end") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.ModuleLevelTriggerRequestLatency" WHERE session::tag = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

targets.query: SELECT mean("latency_in") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TriggerLatency" WHERE session::tag = '${session}' AND "element"::tag =~ /${HSI}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY element, time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("latency_out") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TriggerLatency" WHERE session::tag = '${session}' AND "element"::tag =~ /${HSI}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY element, time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("latency_out") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TriggerLatency" WHERE session::tag = '${session}' AND "element"::tag = '${RandomTCM}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("latency_in") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TriggerLatency" WHERE session::tag = '${session}' AND "element"::tag =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY element, time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("latency_out") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TriggerLatency" WHERE session::tag = '${session}'  AND "element"::tag =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY element, time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("lc_kpaused") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.ModuleLevelTriggerInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("lc_kdead") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.ModuleLevelTriggerInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("rate_payloads_consumed")*1000 FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element"

SELECT mean("num_buffer_elements") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.LatencyBufferInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element" fill(null)

SELECT sum("data") FROM ( SELECT mean("num_buffer_elements") AS "data" FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.LatencyBufferInfo" WHERE  "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element" fill(null) ) GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_buffer_cleanups")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_payloads_overwritten")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("tot_request_response_time")/sum("num_requests_handled") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND "num_requests_handled">0 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("tot_request_response_time")/sum("num_requests_handled") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND "num_requests_handled">0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "element", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT min("min_request_response_time") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND "num_requests_handled">0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT max("max_request_response_time") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND "num_requests_handled">0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("num_requests_waiting") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_found")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_delayed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_timed_out")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_uncategorized")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_payloads_overwritten")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_found")), 1s)  FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_delayed")), 1s)  FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_old_window")), 1s)  FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
